pages.text: If you have any tamed mob that was unfortunately killed due to a bug or disappeared due to a bug, we will gladly help you get it back. $(br2)However, if it just happens to die, there's nothing we can do. It happens to everyone.

$(bold)I am aware about several bugs that cause tamed mobs to disappear and I know why they happen.$(br2)$()Don't try to convince me yours vanished from a bug, but if you think it's a legitimate serious issue, report it on Discord.
